info.title: Wizzx AI API
info.description:
Wizzx AI multi-model API: Veo 3.1 video generation, Kling AI image-to-video, Seedance Pro Fast video generation, Flux Kontext image generation, Nano Banana Pro image generation, Seedream 4.0/4.5 image generation, Kolors Virtual Try-On.
**Breaking Changes (2025-12-10)**: Kling `mode`→`quality_mode` + `image`→`image_urls` (array); Veo `generation_type`→`type` with new enums; Seedance `mode`→`type` + `input_image_url`→`image_urls`.
Authentication: Bearer API key in `Authorization` header.

value.prompt: A dog running through a neon city at night
Make the scene dynamic while keeping the character consistent
Product turntable style, soft studio light

post.summary: Submit Seedance Pro Fast video task

value.prompt: A cat playing piano in a cozy living room
Make the character walk forward gracefully

post.summary: Submit Flux Kontext Pro image task
post.description: Submit an image generation task using Flux Kontext Pro model. Costs 15-20 credits depending on parameters. Uses image_urls array for multi-reference (max 4).

post.summary: Submit Flux Kontext Max image task
post.description: Submit an image generation task using Flux Kontext Max model (premium quality). Costs 20-28 credits depending on parameters. Uses image_urls array for multi-reference (max 4).

post.summary: Submit Nano Banana Pro image task
post.description: Submit an image generation task using Nano Banana Pro model. Supports text-to-image and multi-reference image input (image_urls array). Costs 10-20 credits depending on resolution.
Submit an image generation task using Nano Banana (Google) model. Supports text-to-image and multi-reference image input (up to 10 images). Fixed cost: 24 credits.

value.prompt: A surreal painting of a giant banana floating in space
Transform this into a watercolor painting style

post.description: Submit an image generation task using Seedream 4.0 model. Supports multi-image fusion (image_urls), batch generation, aspect ratios, and resolutions.
Submit an image generation task using Seedream 4.5 model (higher quality). Supports multi-image fusion (image_urls), batch generation, aspect ratios, and resolutions.

Submit an image generation task using Flux 2 Pro model. Supports text-to-image and image-to-image (up to 8 reference images). Pricing: Megapixel (MP) based - 20 credits for first MP + 10 credits per additional MP. Total MP = Input MP + Output MP.

value.prompt: A futuristic city at night with neon lights
Transform this into a watercolor painting

post.description: Submit an image generation task using Flux 2 Flex model with fine-tuned control over guidance and steps. Supports text-to-image and image-to-image (up to 8 reference images). Pricing: Megapixel (MP) based - 40 credits per MP. Total MP = Input MP + Output MP.

value.prompt: A serene mountain landscape with a crystal clear lake
Blend these images into a surreal dreamscape

post.description: Submit virtual try-on task to compose garment and human images.

400.description: Validation error - missing required fields or invalid format

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or expired API key

prompt.description: Text prompt describing the video to generate.

type.description: Generation type (unified field). Defaults based on image_urls presence.

image_urls.description: Image URL array. 1-2 for first/last frames (image-to-video), 1-3 for reference images (reference-to-video).

enable_translation.description: Translate prompt to English for better results.

prompt.description: Text prompt describing the video to generate.

image_urls.description: Input image URL array (unified field). Required for image-to-video, max 1 image.

aspect_ratio.description: Output video aspect ratio. Defaults to 16:9 for text-to-video, adaptive for image-to-video.

seed.description: Random seed for reproducibility. -1 for random.

watermark.description: Whether to add watermark to output video.

camera_fixed.description: Whether to fix the camera position.

task_id.description: Local task id returned from submit.

prompt.description: Text prompt describing the video content.

type.description: Generation type (unified field). Kling only supports image-to-video.

image_urls.description: Reference image URL array (unified field). Must provide exactly 1 image.

quality_mode.description: Quality mode. 'std' for standard, 'pro' for professional quality. (Renamed from 'mode' to avoid conflict with 'type')

image_tail.description: Tail frame control image URL. Mutually exclusive with dynamic_masks/static_mask and camera_control.

negative_prompt.description: Negative text prompt to avoid certain elements.

cfg_scale.description: CFG scale controlling how closely to follow the prompt.

static_mask.description: Static brush mask image URL. Mutually exclusive with image_tail and camera_control.

dynamic_masks.description: Dynamic brush configurations with masks and trajectories. Max 6 groups. Mutually exclusive with image_tail and camera_control.

callback_url.description: Callback URL for task status updates.

trajectories.description: Motion trajectory coordinates (2-77 points for 5s video).

CameraControl.description: Camera movement configuration. Mutually exclusive with image_tail and dynamic_masks/static_mask.

CameraControlConfig.description: Camera control configuration. Required when type is 'simple'. Exactly one parameter must be non-zero.

CreditPricing.description: Credit pricing for Kling AI (based on quality_mode and duration)

prompt.example: A beautiful sunset over the ocean with vibrant colors

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the image between 21:9 and 9:21. Format: width:height (e.g., '16:9', '1:1', '9:16'). Common ratios: 1:1, 4:3, 3:2, 16:9, 9:16, 21:9, 9:21.

image_urls.description: Array of reference image URLs (max 4). JPEG/PNG/WebP, up to 30MB each. Replaces deprecated input_image fields.

output_format.description: Output format for the generated image.

prompt_upsampling.description: Whether to perform upsampling on the prompt. If active, automatically modifies the prompt for more creative generation.

safety_tolerance.description: Tolerance level for input and output moderation. Between 0 and 6, where 0 is most strict and 6 is least strict.

seed.description: Optional seed for reproducibility. Using the same seed with the same parameters will generate similar results.

webhook_url.description: URL to receive webhook notifications when the task completes. Must be between 1 and 2083 characters.

webhook_secret.description: Optional secret for webhook signature verification.

credits_deducted.description: Number of credits deducted for this task.

prompt.description: Text prompt for image generation (max 10000 characters).
prompt.example: A beautiful sunset over the ocean with vibrant colors

image_urls.description: Array of input image URLs (max 8 images, max 30MB each). Replaces deprecated image_input field.

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated image.

resolution.description: Resolution of the generated image. Higher resolution costs more credits.

output_format.description: Output format for the generated image.

credits_deducted.description: Number of credits deducted for this task. 1K/2K = 10 credits, 4K = 20 credits.

prompt.description: Text prompt for image generation (max 10000 characters).
prompt.example: A surreal painting of a giant banana floating in space

image_urls.description: Array of input image URLs (max 10 images). Supports JPEG/PNG/WebP.

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated image.

output_format.description: Output format for the generated image.

credits_deducted.description: Number of credits deducted for this task. Fixed: 24 credits.

prompt.example: A beautiful sunset over the ocean

image_urls.description: Array of input image URLs for image fusion (max 14 images). JPEG/PNG/WebP, up to 30MB each.

resolution.description: Resolution of the generated image (replaces deprecated size field).

batch_size.description: Number of images to generate (1-15). Constraint: input images + batch_size <= 15.

seed.description: Random seed for reproducibility (-1 for random). Range [-1, 2147483647].

watermark.description: Whether to add watermark to output images.

credits_deducted.description: Credits deducted for this task (depends on resolution, input images, and batch size).

prompt.example: A beautiful sunset over the ocean

image_urls.description: Array of input image URLs for image-to-image generation (max 8).

width.description: Output width in pixels (must be used with height).

height.description: Output height in pixels (must be used with width).

prompt.example: A beautiful sunset over the ocean

image_urls.description: Array of input image URLs for image-to-image generation (max 8).

width.description: Output width in pixels (must be used with height).

height.description: Output height in pixels (must be used with width).

prompt_upsampling.description: Enable prompt upsampling for enhanced generation.

guidance.description: Guidance scale. Higher values improve prompt adherence at cost of realism.

steps.description: Number of generation steps. Higher values produce more detailed images.

credits_deducted.description: Number of credits deducted for this task.

human_image.description: Human image (Base64 or accessible URL). jpg/jpeg/png, up to 10MB, width/height at least 300px.

cloth_image.description: Garment image. Supports top/bottom/one-piece. Base64 or accessible URL. jpg/jpeg/png, up to 10MB, width/height at least 300px. v1-5 supports stitched top+bottom.

model_name.description: Model version. v1 = single garment; v1-5 supports stitched top+bottom.
